file.js(6,12): error TS2314: Generic type 'Promise<T>' requires 1 type argument(s).


==== file.js (2 errors) ====
    /**
     * @param {Array} x
               ~~~~~
!!! error TS2314: Generic type 'T[]' requires 1 type argument(s).
     */
    function x(x) {}
    /**
